meanings.definition: The part of the body on both sides of the spine between the lowest (false) ribs and the hipbones.
meanings.sent1: He felt a sharp pain in his loin after lifting the heavy box.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined her loin to check for any signs of injury.
meanings.sent3: Carrying all those books felt like a workout for his loins.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like a fire burning in her loins.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset cast a warm glow on the loins of the mountains.

meanings.definition: The tender meat of the back and sides of an animal, between the ribs and the pelvis.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious dish using the finest loin of beef.
meanings.sent2: She grilled the loin of pork to perfection for the family dinner.
meanings.sent3: The aroma of the cooking loin filled the kitchen with a mouth-watering scent.
meanings.sent4: The loin of lamb was so tender, it practically melted in your mouth.
meanings.sent5: The butcher recommended the loin of veal for its exceptional quality.
